descriptions.first: You are ready to enjoy anecdotes on your own.
descriptions.second: We are here for you: our
descriptions.fourth: are available for you at any time.
descriptions.startWith: Start with connecting your plugins to stream evidence collection, or set your policies to define automated review cycle.

descriptions.welcomDescriptionMain: Our goal is to eliminate compliance legwork and let you enjoy a SaaS platform that automates evidence collection and scales with you.
descriptions.welcomeDescriptionSecondary: Let's start by getting anecdotes ready for your needs.

descriptions.header: Which frameworks are relevant for your organization?
descriptions.tip: Any decision you make now can be changed easily at any time.

descriptions.header: Which tools are part of your organization's technology stack?
descriptions.desctiptionUnderheader: We offer dozens of plugins! Let’s start with the basics:

descriptions.header: Do you already have any organizational policies?
descriptions.headerManage: Where do your manage your files/policies?
descriptions.tipYes: Great! It’s easy to manage your policies with anecdotes.
descriptions.tipNo: We got you covered! Our experts have created templates for the most common policies.

descriptions.tip: You can manage and invite more types of users later

dataDelegation.title: Data Delegation
dataDelegation.description1: Data delegation enables you to store all your data and secrets inside your organization's perimeter. By installing the relevant apps below, you can store data in your own cloud environments. For more information,

sections.Raw data: Raw data is a set of unprocessed data coming from plugins.
sections.Metadata: Metadata is data created by anecdotes as part of the usage (gaps, owners, etc.).
sections.Secrets: Secrets are tokens provided in order to pull data from your plugins.

zendeskAutomationModal.createEvidenceDescription: Select a group, the ticket field that represents the ticket type, and a ticket type, and you'll get a ticket event history of your last 10 ‘Solved’ tickets. In addition, you'll get event history for actions performed by automation or triggers as evidence, as well as the SLA definitions for the group and ticket type you chose. Go to this article for additional information.

freeze-modal.title: Select which Framework(s) can be frozen
freeze-modal.description:
Once Data Freeze is enabled, any control in the framework that is marked as 
"Ready for audit", "Approved by auditor", or "Issue" will be locked.
No new evidence will be collected. You will not be able to edit the control’s
description. You will not be able to update the control owner.

anecdotes-footer.text: Everything compliance, all in one workspace. anecdotes is the first operating system (OS) for every stage of a business’s Compliance journey. It reshapes the way the cloud-powered world thinks about security Compliance, transforming it from a box-ticking exercise into a powerful driver of growth for scale-ups, publicly traded companies, and everything in between. With a variety of applications powered by verified data, Compliance leaders can turn manual, time-consuming and siloed tasks into an automated, continuous and strategic compliance journey. That’s why some of the world’s fastest growing brands use anecdotes. For more information, visit anecdotes.ai.
